AI in higher education

Responsible, evidence-based AI for universities and education providers

I'm Justin O'Brien, PhDâ€”psychologist, AI consultant, and higher education specialist. I help universities navigate AI in teaching, assessment, student support, and recruitment with strategies grounded in measurement science and institutional reality.

How I work with institutions

AI services for universities and education providers

From AI strategy and governance to assessment, academic integrity, and recruitmentâ€”practical, auditable solutions for institutional AI challenges.

Strategy & governance

AI strategy for universities

Institution-wide AI strategies, policies, and operating models that balance innovation with risk management and regulatory compliance.

  • AI roadmaps aligned with institutional priorities
  • Governance frameworks and decision-making structures
  • Executive briefings and stakeholder alignment

Assessment & integrity

Assessment in the AI era

Redesigning assessment, grading, and feedback to be robust to generative AI while preserving academic standards, fairness, and meaningful learning.

  • Audits of existing assessment portfolios
  • Designing authentic, AI-resilient assessment tasks
  • Academic integrity policies and workflows aligned with current tools

Recruitment & selection

AI in candidate assessment

Designing, auditing, and validating AI-enabled screening and candidate assessment systems for fairness, accuracy, and regulatory defensibility.

  • Clarifying what can and cannot be inferred from documents and responses
  • Validation and fairness audits for AI-driven scoring systems
  • White papers and explainers for clients, candidates, and regulators
